description:
Hi all,
I have two Cinder server installed( iscsi+LVM ). all of my Openstack compenents are grizzly version.
Now,cinder can create volumes, but failed  to attach volume to instance.
Thanks!
 
# nova volume-attach <> <> /dev/vdc

error info from /var/log/nova/compute:
2013-06-26 02:29:34.849 9751 TRACE nova.openstack.common.rpc.amqp Traceback (most recent call last):
2013-06-26 02:29:34.849 9751 TRACE nova.openstack.common.rpc.amqp   File "/usr/local/python2.7/lib/python2.7/site-packages/nova/openstack/common/rpc/amqp.py", line 430, in _process_data

2013-06-26 02:29:34.849 9751 TRACE nova.openstack.common.rpc.amqp   File "/usr/local/python2.7/lib/python2.7/site-packages/nova/openstack/common/rpc/dispatcher.py", line 133, in dispatch
2013-06-26 02:29:34.849 9751 TRACE nova.openstack.common.rpc.amqp     return getattr(proxyobj, method)(ctxt, **kwargs)
2013-06-26 02:29:34.849 9751 TRACE nova.openstack.common.rpc.amqp   File "/usr/local/python2.7/lib/python2.7/site-packages/nova/exception.py", line 117, in wrapped

2013-06-26 02:29:34.849 9751 TRACE nova.openstack.common.rpc.amqp     return f(self, context, *args, **kw)
2013-06-26 02:29:34.849 9751 TRACE nova.openstack.common.rpc.amqp   File "/usr/local/python2.7/lib/python2.7/site-packages/nova/compute/manager.py", line 209, in decorated_function

2013-06-26 02:29:34.849 9751 TRACE nova.openstack.common.rpc.amqp   File "/usr/local/python2.7/lib/python2.7/site-packages/nova/compute/manager.py", line 237, in decorated_function

2013-06-26 02:29:34.849 9751 TRACE nova.openstack.common.rpc.amqp     context, instance, mountpoint)

2013-06-26 02:29:34.849 9751 TRACE nova.openstack.common.rpc.amqp DeviceIsBusy: The supplied device (vdc) is busy.
title: nova volume-attach failed with error info 'DeviceIsBusy: The supplied device (vdc) is busy'

Hi all,
I have two Cinder server installed( iscsi+LVM ). all of my Openstack compenents are grizzly version.
Now,cinder can create volumes, but failed  to attach volume to instance.
Thanks!
